description: Non-essential shops will close until mid-December to help curb the highest infection rate in Europe.
title: Covid: Belgium announces return to national lockdown
title_page: Covid: Belgium announces return to national lockdown - BBC News
maintext: And in Spain there have been clashes between police and demonstrators in Barcelona, who turned out in the streets against new coronavirus restrictions - including a curfew and a ban on leaving the city over the weekend.
